pr_title: Return azure core HttpResponseException for service side exceptions

timeline.author: mssfang

timeline.bodyText: @srnagar Does this seem like something we would want the autorest to be doing for the client ?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Yes, I think it is better to define in swagger or make it configurable on swagger readme. Search has the same problem.
replies.author: sima-zhu

replies.bodyText: AutoRest will always provide the most specific error response. It's for the convenience layer to determine if it should be converted to a more generic exception type.
replies.author: srnagar
